overview: The Two From The Gas Station -  Trudi and Toni helping their mother out in a gas station. But instead of asking the customers for "cash", they both are contented with a different kind of payment. This naturally leads to various complications.  Board Games - The reporter Ellen wants to perform an interview in a very special club. But once the wild sex games start, you can no longer hold yourself back.  Pillow Talk - Mr. Fiedler acquires a fully furnished apartment. On his first night he dreams of all the sex games that have taken place in this bed with the previous tenants. He eagerly sets about to acquaint himself with the other residents.  Mannequin - Miss Jaspers gets a job as a photographer for a sex magazine. But first she must get familiar with the subject matter. She is actively supported by the models and employees. What starts casual conversations degenerates into an unrestrained orgy
title: Golden Century of Porn 3
